gist.headline: Digital storefront polish
gist.blurb: THISX joins the gardenâ€”an AI companion for e-commerce that handles store fixes and ad campaigns so you can focus on the product.
gist.summary: Added THISX, an AI platform for e-commerce optimization and Meta ads, to the developer tools showcase.
gist.impact: Developers and merchants can now discover THISX in the community apps list for help with store maintenance and advertising.
gist.visual_concept: A cozy pixel art market stall representing e-commerce. The bee mascot is arranging items on a shelf or looking at a digital catalog. Warm, inviting commerce vibe.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot arranging pixelated items at a tiny wooden market stall labeled 'THISX'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and peach gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, chunky sprites.
